original_text:
“You shall eat in plenty and be satisfied,
    and praise the name of the Lord your God,
    who has dealt wondrously with you.
And my people shall never again be put to shame.
korean_text: 너희는 먹되 풍족히 먹고 너희에게 놀라운 일을 행하신 너희 하나님 여호와의 이름을 찬송할 것이라 내 백성이 영원히 수치를 당하지 아니하리로다

sentences.original_text: You shall eat in plenty and be satisfied,
and praise the name of the Lord your God,
who has dealt wondrously with you.
And my people shall never again be put to shame.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성은 다시는 수치를 당하지 아니하리라.
